EmailTemplate.name: PAS 2017 _SIW.PAS 2017 _PreCat eVite
EmailTemplate.subject: Paris Air Show 2017 - Honeywell Brunch
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> You Are Invited Paris Air Show 2017 Honeywell Brunch Date June 18, 2017 Time 11am-2pm Location Le Pré Catelan – Salons Bois de Boulogne Route de la Grande Cascade 75000 Paris Begin your Paris Air Show experience with Honeywell and an exquisite brunch at a world-famous restaurant in the heart of the Bois de Boulogne. Senior leaders from Honeywell Aerospace look forward to connecting with you at this stunning venue. Please join us. Kindly RSVP by June 9, 2017. Contact us at aero.marketing@honeywell.com <[[mailto:aero.marketing@honeywell.com]]> with any questions. Read about Honeywell Aerospace activities for Paris Air Show 2017 and more by visiting aerospace.honeywell.com <[[aerospace.honeywell.com]]>.
CLICK HERE TO RSVP <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2017ParisAirShow_BrunchInvite.html]]>
Honeywell Aerospace Event Team
